text: wma akhtalaf aladhin 'uwtuu alkitab min alyhwd walnsara fi kawn muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam rasulana hqana; lamaa yajidunah min neth fi ktabhm, 'iilaa min baed ma tbynu 'anah alnabii aldhy wueidu bih fi altawrat wal'injyl, fakanuu mjtmeyn ealaa sihat nbwth, falamaa bueith jhdwha wtfrraqu
